  • Method Details

    • BTCToCNSIM

      public static double BTCToCNSIM(double BTCDiff)
      Converts from Bitcoin difficulty to CNSIM difficulty. Note that when BTC difficulty is given directly, simply scale the converted initial BTC difficulty.
      Parameters:
      BTCDiff - The given Bitcoin difficulty.
      Returns:
      The equivalent CNSIM difficulty.

    • CNSIMToBTC

      public static double CNSIMToBTC(double CNSIMDiff)
      Converts from CNSIM difficulty to Bitcoin difficulty. Note that we simply scale the converted initial CNSIM to BTC difficulty for the current CNSIM difficulty level. WARNING: may potentially result in impossible Bitcoin difficulty levels if the CNSIM difficulty is too low. Be aware that returned BTC difficulties may be less than 1!
      Parameters:
      CNSIMDiff - The given CNSIM difficulty.
      Returns:
      The equivalent Bitcoin difficulty.

    • packedTargetToCNSIM

      public static double packedTargetToCNSIM(String bits)
      Often, bitcoin difficulty is not given directly, but implicitly through a packed target value ("bits"). This convenience function converts from the packed target value to the equivalent CNSIM difficulty directly.
      Parameters:
      bits - The bitcoin metric representing the truncated current target.
      Returns:
      The equivalent CNSIM difficulty.

    • CNSIMToPackedTarget

      public static String CNSIMToPackedTarget(double CNSIMDiff)
      Convenience function to directly convert a CNSIM difficulty to the equivalent packed bitcoin target value (bdiff).
      Parameters:
      CNSIMDiff - The given CNSIM difficulty level.
      Returns:
      The equivalent bitcoin packed target value.

    • poolTargetToCNSIM

      public static double poolTargetToCNSIM(String poolTarget)
      Often, bitcoin difficulty is not given directly, but implicitly through a target value (the pool target is the full, untruncated value of this target). This convenience function converts from the pool target value to the equivalent CNSIM difficulty directly.
      Parameters:
      poolTarget - The bitcoin metric representing the full current target.
      Returns:
      The equivalent CNSIM difficulty.

    • CNSIMToPoolTarget

      public static String CNSIMToPoolTarget(double CNSIMDiff)
      Convenience function to directly convert a CNSIM difficulty to the equivalent full bitcoin target value (i.e. pool target value).
      Parameters:
      CNSIMDiff - The given CNSIM difficulty level.
      Returns:
      The equivalent bitcoin pool target value.

    • packedTargetToBTCDifficulty

      public static BigDecimal packedTargetToBTCDifficulty(String bits) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Converts current target to equivalent, implied difficulty rating. Format of packed target is 8 hex digits, with the first two digits the index, and the remaining 6 digits representing the coefficient. The target is calculated as: coefficient * 2^(8 * (index - 3)), with the leading digits being padded with zeroes. In other words, adding 1 to the value of the index places another two trailing hex zeroes to the target.
      Parameters:
      bits - The bitcoin metric representing the truncated current target.
      Returns:
      The equivalent difficulty for this current target.

    • poolTargetToBTCDifficulty

      public static BigDecimal poolTargetToBTCDifficulty(String poolTarget) throws IllegalArgumentException
      From the pool difficulty (i.e. full, untruncated target value), calculates and returns the implied difficulty level.
      Parameters:
      poolTarget -
      Returns:
      The equivalent difficulty for this current target.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - The hexstring should be 64 hex digits, and should not be less the minimum target value.

    • BTCDifficultyToPoolTarget

      public static String BTCDifficultyToPoolTarget(BigDecimal difficulty)
      From the bitcoin difficulty, generates the equivalent full target string (i.e. pool target).
      Parameters:
      difficulty - The given level of bitcoin difficulty.
      Returns:
      The pool target string implied by the given difficulty.

    • BTCDifficultyToPackedTarget

      public static String BTCDifficultyToPackedTarget(BigDecimal difficulty)
      From the given bitcoin difficulty, generates the packed target string that is closest to the specified difficulty.
      Parameters:
      difficulty - The given level of bitcoin difficulty.
      Returns:
      The packed target string implied by the given difficulty.
